name: Thison’s creation #3 “ A TRIPPY JOURNEY WITH SHIVA ”
description:
It's the end of the world or the darker side of the universe. Either way, it's the end of the journey for the human and he watches in awe how Lord Shiva performs the cosmic dance of death. This mysterious artwork represents how the idol maintains balance for the rhythm of the dance and it's a metaphor for the power of the universe, which Lord Shiva is believed to hold so masterfully. 

Original concept and digital illustration by Thison Nayanake from Ceylon Metaverse. Copyright ownership is granted to token holders. Collectors can tag us on Twitter @CeylonMetaverse and/ or message us so we can grant you a letter of authenticity.
